Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: OTE: Orderer Test Engine traffic generation and verification tool for orderer functional tests
Issue.description: Orderer traffic driver which acts as a manager, to drive the orderer functional tests, should launch the network with multiple configurations, start/stop the components of the network, send multiple broadcast transactions and receive deliveries, and retrieve results/counts/duration. Some tests can then be written and executed from CI.
